text: Blausee (literally: Blue Lake) is a small lake, in Switzerland, in the Kander valley above Kandergrund at , near the river Kander. Administratively, it belongs to the Bernese Oberland. The lake has an area of . The lake can be reached by bus from the train stations of Frutigen or Kandersteg. It is a popular tourist destination.
